text: Richard Roland Hawley (born 13 August 1955 in Bradford, West Riding of Yorkshire) is a British actor, best known for his work in Grushko, Prime Suspect, Family Affairs and Love Actually. From 2015 to 2021, he appeared as Johnny Connor in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:Actors from Bradford
title: Richard Hawley (actor)
